casebody.data:
Howell BURGESS, alias Blackle, alias Howard Burgess, Appellant, v. UNITED STATES of America, Appellee. No. 5912. Circuit Court of Appeals, Fifth Circuit. Dec. 13, 1930. Alfred Du Perier, of Beaumont, Tex., for appellant. S. D. Bennett, Asst. U. S. Atty., of Beaumont, Tex. (Randolph Bryant, U. S. Atty., of Sherman, Tex., on the brief), for the United States.

Before BRYAN, FOSTER, and WALKER, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

The judgment is affirmed.
